name: Jersey Devil's: Journey Perils
description:
You are the Jersey Devil, you sneak onto a farm as the sun goes down. Getting in to feast upon all of the animals. night comes soon, you must get them all before it gets too dark.

To move around, use the mouse to move the character around and run into all of the yellow highlighted animals to eat them, get all 30 before the 3 minute clock runs out.
